text: Wiesbaden 2013 Grégory Wathelet (born 10 September 1980) is a Belgian equestrian who competes in the sport of show jumping. At the 2012 Summer Olympics in London, he was a member of the Belgian team in the team jumping competition which his team, composed of Le Jeune, Demeersman and Lansink, finished in thirteenth place. ==International Championship Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan="11" align="center" | Results |- !
